Test Description:
Create mirrored volumes. Run IOs. Allow IOs to complete. Calculate cksum on volumes. 
Create snapshots and LCVs out of snapshot. Calculate cksum of LCVs. Should match with volumes.
Write on LCVs. Allow IO to complete. Calculate cksum. 
Reboot one of the target node. Allow plexes of volumes and LCVs to complete resync.
Calculate cksum of volumes and plexes. cksum before and after reboot should match.

Create mirrored volumes. Run IOs. Allow IOs to complete. Calculate cksum on volumes. 
Create snapshots and LCVs out of snapshot. Calculate cksum of LCVs. Should match with volumes.
Write on LCVs. Allow IO to complete. Calculate cksum. 
Reboot initiator node. Allow plexes of volumes and LCVs to complete resync.
Calculate cksum of volumes and plexes. cksum before and after reboot should match.

Create mirrored volumes. Run IOs. Allow IOs to complete. Calculate cksum on volumes. 
Create snapshots and LCVs out of snapshot. Calculate cksum of LCVs. Should match with volumes.
Write on LCVs. Allow IO to complete. Calculate cksum. 
Reboot one of the target node and initiator node. Allow plexes of volumes and LCVs to complete resync.
Calculate cksum of volumes and plexes. cksum before and after reboot should match.

Create mirrored volumes. Run IOs. Allow IOs to complete. Calculate cksum on volumes. 
Create snapshots and LCVs out of snapshot. Calculate cksum of LCVs. Should match with volumes.
Write on LCVs. Allow IO to complete. Calculate cksum. 
Reboot all the nodes. Allow plexes of volumes and LCVs to complete resync.
Calculate cksum of volumes and plexes. cksum before and after reboot should match.

Create mirrored volumes. Run fio. Create snapshots & LCV out of snapshot. Run fio on LCV. While fio is running on LCV, reboot one of the node. After node comes up, verify data across all plexes of LCV. checksum of original volume should not change

Create mirrored volumes. Run fio with concurrent writes (thread = 4 or 8) on the volume. 
Create snapshot and LCV while the fio is running. Run fio with multiple threads on the LCV.
Reboot the node that contains the LCV. Delete the LCV, snapshot and volumes.
(Can't do data verification here due to multiple threads)

Create mirrored volume. Run fio. Shutdown initiator. Detach volumes forcefully. Attach to some other node. Create snapshot of volume & LCV out of snapshot. Verify cksum on plexes of LCV and plexes of volumes
Expected Behaviour: Snapshot created when initiator node is down, it remains in scheduled state.

Test Description: Create mirrored volume. Run fio. Calculate checksum on all plexes. Shutdown initiator. Force detach the volumes. Attach to some other node. Create snapshot of volume & LCV out of snapshot. Power on the initiator. Verify cksum on plexes of volumes and LCVs
Create mirrored volume. Run fio. Shutdown one target. Allow fio to complete. Create snapshot of volume & LCV out of snapshot. Verify data on plexes that are up and plexes of LCV
Create mirrored volume. Run fio. Shutdown one target. Allow fio to complete. Create snapshot of volume & LCV out of snapshot. Power on the target. Verify data on plexes of volumes and LCVs

Create mirrored volume. Run fio. Shutdown 2 targets. Allow fio to complete. Create snapshot of volume & LCV out of snapshot. Power on the targets. Verify data on plexes of volumes and LCVs
[Needs 5 node setup]
Expected Behaviour: Can't be done on 3 node setup.

Test Description: Create 3 way mirrored volume. Run fio. Delete a plex. Create snapshot & LCV out of snapshot. Verify data across volume plexes and LCV plexes
Create 3 way mirrored volume. Run fio. Create snapshot and LCV. Write data on LCV. Delete 1 or 2 plexes from original volume. Reboot nodes. Data should remain intact before and after reboot
